biography: Jarkko, affectionately known as "Bailando" among his peers, is a familiar face at the Hector Trophée, representing Hirsala Golf. With a remarkable eight past appearances, Jarkko has become a mainstay in this esteemed tournament.

Beyond his consistent presence, Jarkko has demonstrated exceptional skill and determination on the course. His efforts culminated in a well-deserved victory at one of the past Hector Trophée events, a testament to his prowess in pair play. Adding to his accolades, Jarkko has also claimed the coveted Victor Trophy, showcasing his individual talent and cementing his status as a formidable competitor.

As he prepares for his ninth appearance at the Hector Trophée in 2025, anticipation builds to see what Jarkko will bring to the competition this time around. With his experience, skill, and the unwavering support of his fans, Jarkko is undoubtedly one to watch.
